name: Evergreens – your best content
author: Stefan BÃ¶ttcher

sections.description:
Evergreens are all time classics in music and now your content!
Highlight specific posts right in the admin and mark your best content. Also comes with [evergreens] shortcode to show your best content
wherever you want.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen in WordPress
  3. Use the star icon to mark your evergreens
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen in WordPress
  3. Use the star icon to mark your evergreens

short_description: Highlight specific posts and show them with [evergreens] shortcode.
